org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.impl

Class ApplicationFrameworkLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.impl.ApplicationFrameworkLayer

  • public class ApplicationFrameworkLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a singelton aimed at sharing the the Application Framework Layer status of the ZigBee Base Drier among all the ZigBeeEndpoint registered by it.

    In particular, this class tracks the Transaction Id and the Active End Point on the hardware providing access to ZigBee Network (currently the Texas Instrument CC2480).

    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

      • getNextTransactionId

        public byte getNextTransactionId(short endPoint)
        Returns the next transaction ID for the specified endpoint.

        Transaction IDs are tracked separately for each endpoint.

        Parameters:
        endPoint - the endpoint number
        Returns:
        byte transaction ID
